name: Avocado Salad
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, lunch, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: appetizer, main course, side dish, avocado, vegetables, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 3 Haas avocados, ripe but not too soft, peeled and diced
1 medium red onion, peeled and diced
1 medium cucumber, peeled, seeded and cut into 1/8-inch slices
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Toss together the avocado, scallions, red pepper and onion. Add the cucumber and tomatoes. Add the lime juice and then the olive oil. Season with salt and pepper.
